text: Amblycheila picolominii is a species of nocturnal tiger beetle in the genus Amblycheila. Its common name is the plateau giant tiger beetle. It was discovered in 1839.Krell, F. and J. O. Brookhart. (2012). The plateau giant tiger beetle, Amblycheila picolominii Reiche, 1839, in Utah: New state record (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae). Western North American Naturalist 72(1) 110-11. ==References== Category:Cicindelinae Category:Beetles described in 1839
title: Amblycheila picolominii
